cookingTips: Let batter rest 30 minutes to an hour for best results and thinner, more tender crepes
Use medium-high heat and lightly butter the pan between crepes
Tilt and swirl the pan immediately after pouring batter for thin, even coverage
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Emphasize the simplicity of the recipe while guiding on proper technique. Suggest letting batter rest and demonstrate the swirling motion for thin crepes.
